sentence.Network_cn: 谨慎细致可使你避免发生差错.

sentence.Network_en: With an almost occult carefulness he turned the door handle, and opened the door an inch.
sentence.Network_cn: 他带着一种几乎是超自然的谨慎,旋转门把柄, 随着低微的嘎吱声,门开了一条缝.

sentence.Network_en: These young people are full of vigour, but fail in carefulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些年青人劲道十足, 但还不够过细.

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of being cautious; being attentive to possible danger;
2. the quality of being careful and painstaking;

sentences.sentence: "I admired the carefulness of his work"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"性质,状态",通常加在形容词后面
